meanings.definition: A person who works with ruddle.
meanings.sent1: The ruddleman mixed the ruddle with water to create a paste.
meanings.sent2: The ruddleman applied the red ruddle to the walls of the house.
meanings.sent3: The ruddleman accidentally spilled the ruddle all over himself, turning red from head to toe.
meanings.sent4: The ruddleman's hands were stained red like a painter's palette.
meanings.sent5: The ruddleman's job was to make everything look red, like a walking paintbrush.

meanings.definition: A worker who applies ruddle to surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The skilled ruddleman carefully coated the walls with the red pigment.
meanings.sent2: The ruddleman's job was to make sure every surface was covered in ruddle.
meanings.sent3: The ruddleman joked that he was turning into a human tomato with all the ruddle he used.
meanings.sent4: The ruddleman's brush danced across the walls, leaving a trail of red behind.
meanings.sent5: The ruddleman's presence in a room was like a splash of red paint on a blank canvas.

meanings.definition: A laborer who uses ruddle in their trade.
meanings.sent1: The diligent ruddleman worked hard to finish the job on time.
meanings.sent2: The ruddleman's hands were always covered in the red substance after a day's work.
meanings.sent3: The ruddleman's coworkers teased him about looking like a red ghost with all the ruddle dust on him.
meanings.sent4: The ruddleman's expertise with the pigment made him stand out among other laborers.
meanings.sent5: The ruddleman's dedication to his craft was as bright as the red pigment he used.
